# numberOfColumns

**Instance Property**

Returns the number of columns represented by views in the table row view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var numberOfColumns: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The number of columns may not be equal to the number of columns in the enclosing [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView], if this row view is a group style and has a single view that spans the entire width of the row.

## Row Grouping

- **isGroupRowStyle**: Specifies whether this row view is a group row.

items.description: Specifies whether this row view is a group row.
